duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and manage the quality control and quality assurance processes and procedures.
Identify areas of improvement and create processes to address them.
Work closely with internal teams to ensure products and services meet established quality standards.
Communicate effectively and work collaboratively with internal teams and customers.
Maintain a safety-driven mindset and knowledge of safety regulations and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Quality Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
5+ years of experience in Quality Assurance/Quality Control
